entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @Mikel_Jollett You talked like this kills everybody regardless of health condition. Are you against Covid-19 or Trump?  Chinese say the US created Covid-19. I think that idea is insane but then I see all the Trump haters that want them to fail *no natter what it takes*... then I scratch my head
